charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1101_0100:
Targeting Ethan’s Lugia, a group of Team Break
members ventured into the mountains.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1101_0200:
Having learned of this,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] headed in
the same direction out of concern.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_0300:
Huh? What are you doing
here, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_0401_0500: Team Break? Oh, I see what’s going on.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_0402_0700:
What do you mean? Oh, wait...are you talking
about Team Break?
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_0800:
You came all this way because you were worried
about us?
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_0900: Well, don’t worry! I took care of them already!
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_1000: I didn’t even have to lift a finger.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_1100:
I tried to help, but Ethan and Lugia were so
strong, there wasn’t an opening to join in.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_0301_1200: You defeated them on your own?!
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_0401_1300:
They may have had us outnumbered, but their
teamwork was pretty bad.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_0402_1500:
Well, toward the end there were a few
Team Break members who ran off without
putting up a fight.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_1600:
I mean, this isn’t the first time you’ve done
something like this.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_1700:
Remember when you rushed into the radio tower
in Goldenrod City all by yourself?
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_1800:
You beat all the Team Rocket members occupying
the tower, right?
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_1900: Ahaha... Well, I was a bit angry when I did that.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_2000:
Either way, what I did today was mostly thanks to
Lugia being such a reliable partner.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_2100:
My Lugia is so powerful, it usually tries to keep its
distance from humans as a precaution.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_2200:
I think it goes to show how strong and kind a
Pokémon Lugia is.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_0301_2300: But it likes to stay around you two?
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_0302_2500: Lugia doesn’t avoid you two, does it?
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_0402_2600: Well... It was different in the beginning.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_2700:
When we first met, Lugia was hesitant to get
too close.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_2800:
It felt like Lugia was curious about me but still
measuring my abilities.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_2900: But now, it stays right beside me.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_3000:
It looks like Lugia finally acknowledged my
potential. I’m relieved.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_0401_3200: Thanks! It feels great to be acknowledged by it!
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_0302_3300: Looks like your hard work paid off!
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_0402_3400:
Thanks! But that didn’t happen because I worked
extra hard to impress Lugia or anything like that.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_3500:
I just adventured like I always do—and helped
who I could along the way.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_3600:
Since we’re going to be together for a while,
I wanted Lugia to accept me for who I really am.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_3900: Talking about all this just reminded me...
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_4000: Lugia reminds me of another one of my friends.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_4200:
Yup! He tries to keep his distance and has a
strong independent streak.
charaepi_ch0112_10_hibiki/2301_1201_4300:
But he’s acknowledged me as his rival and is a
super-important friend of mine!
